snippet: In a major diplomatic break after the assassination of the half brother of North Korea’s leader, the Malaysian government declared Ambassador Kang Chol “persona non grata.”...

headline.main: Pakistan's Police Find Body Bearing Marks of IS Execution
headline.print_headline: Pakistan's Police Find Body Bearing Marks of IS Execution

lead_paragraph: In a major diplomatic break after the assassination of the half brother of North Korea’s leader, the Malaysian government declared Ambassador Kang Chol “persona non grata.”
